typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ts as string,
		userId as string,
		sessionId as string,
		page as string,
		auth as string,
		method as string,
		status as string,
		level as string,
		itemInSession as string,
		location as string,
		lastName as string,
		firstName as string,
		registration as string,
		gender as string,
		artist as string,
		song as string,
		length as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> smallRadio
smallRadio select(mapColumn(
		time_stamp = ts,
		page,
		method,
		status,
		level_type = level,
		location,
		lastName,
		firstName,
		registration,
		gender
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> seleccionarColumnas
seleccionarColumnas aggregate(groupBy(location),
	SubscribersByLocation = count(),
		time_stamp = first(time_stamp)) ~> SubscribersByLocation
seleccionarColumnas aggregate(groupBy(gender,
		level_type),
	countOfSubTypeByGender = count(),
		time_stamp = first(time_stamp)) ~> countOfSubTypeByGender
seleccionarColumnas select(mapColumn(
		time_stamp,
		page,
		method,
		status,
		level_type,
		location,
		lastName,
		firstName,
		registration,
		gender
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> datosOriginales
datosOriginales, SubscribersByLocation join(datosOriginales@time_stamp == SubscribersByLocation@time_stamp,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> subscribersByLocDatosOri
subscribersByLocDatosOri, countOfSubTypeByGender join(datosOriginales@time_stamp == countOfSubTypeByGender@time_stamp,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
